extendedInfo.description: Display custom notification icons/dots on the screen. It was developed for the Samsung Galaxy S which lacks a physical dedicated LED.Supported notifications:-Text Messages-Voice Messages-Missed Calls-Google Talk-A Charging indicator-Calendar events-Emails (K9 and Gmail can have their own custom settings)-All other 3rd party apps. For example, Whatsapp, Yahoo Mail and Hotmail. You can enable these via the Monitored Apps feature.-A charging indicatorThere are many options included in the app that help you customize your notifications and have them delivered the way you want. From Audio and Vibration reminders to Battery saving features and custom colors/icons for each notification type.Use the provided widget to know NoLED's statusupdating? please don't forget to enable NoLED from the Accessibility menu again.problems? email me or read the FAQ (solutions to most of your problems are there)Worried about NoLED's required permissions? Please see FAQ Q10 at http://www.devasque.com/noled/FAQ.php or contact me directlyVideo promo made by totallydubbedHD, Thank you.

reviews.title: Just perfect
reviews.comment: It works perfectly.on my lenovo s560, that doesn\'t have a led notification. this app is a perfect solution for knowing any incoming and missed notifications. Well done devs!
reviews.author: Yogi Saptoko

reviews.title: Simple solution to TalkBack issue!
reviews.comment: Don\'t disable TalkBack or TTS functions, u lose other functions by doing that such as spoken street names in Google Nav and briefing feature in alarm clock. When u restart ur phone and it activates TalkBack just go into accessibility settings, slide the one for NoLED to \"off\" and u will see the TalkBack icon disappear from notification bar, then just slide NoLED back to \"on\" without ever leaving the accessibility screen. U must wait for phone to completely boot or NoLED will restart before it ends TalkBack.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!!
reviews.comment: This is the best app of my phn.. simpl to use and just amazing... by the contact pictures its easy to recognize whether to unlock da phn or not!  Now i never miss a single notification..
reviews.author: Adeena Qadir

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app, I\'ve been super happy with it and it\'s features! I wish there was a setting so the clock would only show while charging so I could use it as a bedside clock. Can I have that? I saw a couple similar posts on the faq\'s website, so I know I\'m not the only one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work right on Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I love this app. But it needs a revamp for the Galaxy S4. Doesn\'t show the notifications or pictures of ur contacts, like it use to. And the older versions aren\'t compatible with Jelly Bean 4.22.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very simple and useful
reviews.comment: You can see notification from many apps without unlock the phone. Could be possible put icons inline on top of screen. :(
reviews.author: Roberto Robson

reviews.title: Huge memory hog
reviews.comment: Why is the memory foot print so huge for a simple notification app?  20Mb for some colorful dots?
reviews.author: Pasi Sainio

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I like the various options for color and size of notifications. Facebook notifications dont work for me but with this app, I can use the fb icon to notify me of updates.
reviews.author: Benjamin Tom

reviews.title: Almost perfect!
reviews.comment: I use this even *with* my LED light because notifications are much easier to see at a distance! Droid 4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The great & unmatched
reviews.comment: NoLed delivered exactly what I was looking for. Everything perfectly performing its job.............. Everyone one should have this application who care about notification.
reviews.author: Gaurav Rai

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: This is fantastic. I have 1 small issue I use toucher and this app makes the touch pointer come on the screen with it,s notification.
reviews.author: Paul Routledge

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Working perfectly fine. The only additional thing I would love to have is a counter (next to the icon) that shows the number of missed calls/messages.
reviews.author: Dragan Milic

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: After the last update i love it even more. The new features are brilliant and very intuitive. Just perfect.
reviews.author: Marius Popa

reviews.title: Looks Good
reviews.comment: My Nokia n8 had a feature called Sleeping Screen. It was fantastic since oled displays are capable of only lighting the pixels used for the picture rather than the entire screen so it wasn\'t draining on the battery. Sleeping screen could not only show notifications and a clock, but also have images displayed at a lower res. I even modded nokias version with my own screens, google chillerhippie sleeping screen. I would love it to become androids own sleeping screen. It\'s so close! Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Nick Wood

reviews.title: Works great with a slight problem
reviews.comment: In accessibility, turning noled on greys out the path keyboard and turns on text to speech. If someone can help me fix this, app will be 5 stars
reviews.author: Cody Deopp

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: i can only recommend this feature, but i have a small issue... i use sliding messages, and the botification doesn\'t show. i set it as the default sms on noled. help? :)
reviews.author: Vasilache Andrei

reviews.title: problem with jelly bean 4.1.2
reviews.comment: issues with talkback - please fix it urgent as i love this with ice cream sandwich 4.0.4 and after 1 year upgrade to jelly bean 4.1.2 and now keeping getting talkback issues. what a annoying. problem on samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: Philip Sedgley

reviews.title: Solid, works well. recommended
reviews.comment: Researching an app since my phone doesn\'t have LED notifications, this works pretty well. Displays an icon on the screen when I get an notification, so I really like it.   Just be sure if you want it set for any app notification, the app must display its own notification on the status bar first in order for the app to display it on the main screen. Otherwise, this is a great solution to known if you received a notification.
reviews.author: Jackie Yip

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: Works well after fine tuning settings.  Does turn screen on, will drain battery, so adjust the settings as accordingly.
reviews.author: Matt Shultz

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: 1 word for this app CRAP! not very good.... turns off when it wants and somtimes icons dont show on screen even tho it says its on! Its lucky to get 1 star!
reviews.author: Mark Lowery
